content:encoded:
A young Indian named Snowfoot will not go onto the Reservation.

Original Air Date: May 06, 1956
Host: Andrew Rhynes
Show: Fort Laramie
Phone: (707) 98 OTRDW (6-8739)

Stars:
• Raymond Burr (Captain Lee Quince)
• Vic Perrin (Sgt. Goerss)
• Jack Moyles (Major Daggett)
• Harry Bartel (Lt. Siberts)

Special Guests:
• Lillian Buyeff
• Ralph Moody
• John Dehner
• John Stephenson
• Don Diamond

Writer:
• William N. Robson

Producer:
• Norman Macdonnell

Music:
• Amerigo Moreno

Exit music from: Roundup on the Prairie by Aaron Kenny https://bit.ly/3kTj0kK
